game.name: RealmWalker
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Combine elemental powers to battle through legions of creatures in RealmWalker, a third-person roguelite ARPG. Trapped in the fractured dimension of Setsara, master an evolving arsenal of spells, uncover an ancient secret and defeat powerful bosses to reclaim your freedom.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Combine elemental powers to battle through legions of creatures in RealmWalker, a third-person roguelite ARPG. Trapped in the fractured dimension of Setsara, master an evolving arsenal of spells, uncover an ancient secret and defeat powerful bosses to reclaim your freedom.
